channel.title: Herosscape need ur help
channel.description:
k heres the deal peopl this server can hold up to at least 100 players before lagging maybe even more i need as many people as possible to go on it we are trying to see its player limit before it laggs please log on and plus where new WE ARE ALWAYS NEVER EVER NOT ONLINE INLESS WE ARE RESTARTING OR SOMTHING LIKE THAT we are working on many things at the same time so when the server gets new updates it gets alot!
it is hamachi inless some one can tell me how to make a dedicated server thankyou very much for reading
